T02D1484:133b-1: shr'i tsa kra sam ba ra s'a dha nam ratna d'i pa /
T02D1484:133b-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs rin po che'i sgron ma //
T02D1484:133b-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1484:133b-5: gang zhig rnam dag kun du rtog yangs mkha' 'dra'i chos sku dang //
T02D1484:133b-6: dpe med phun tshogs bde bas rnam mdzes longs spyod rdzogs sku nyid //
T02D1484:133b-7: sa rnams kun du phan mdzad rab gsal sprul pa'i skur brjod gang //
T02D1484:133b-8: bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' de yis khyed la
T02D1484:133b-9: bde legs shog / dang por re zhig rnal 'byor
T02D1484:133b-10: pa dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dbang bskur ba dang
T02D1484:133b-11: yang dag par ldan pas yid dang rjes su mthun
T02D1484:133b-12: zhing dben bar bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste /
T02D1484:133b-13: dam tshig brtan par byas nas rang gi snying gar
T02D1484:133b-14: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um nag po bltas la
T02D1484:133b-15: bla ma'i man ngag ji bzhin pas sngags bskong pa'i
T02D1484:133b-17: dam tshig gi rdzas sbyangs shing blangs te /
T02D1484:133b-18: zhal bzhi pa'i sngags kyis phyogs bzhi dang bdag tu
T02D1484:133b-19: byas pa la gtor ba dang yan lag la yang
T02D1484:133b-20: dgod par bya zhing bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor
T02D1484:133b-21: bsrung bar bya'o // de nas dri zhim po dang bcas pa'i chus mdun du mandala byas te /
T02D1484:133b-22: bdud rtsi lnga dang dam tshig can gyis byugs la /
T02D1484:133b-23: de'i dbus su g-yon pa'i ming med kyis mnan te /
T02D1484:133b-24: pu dza la sogs pa'i yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhis rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D1484:133b-25: gnas la sogs pa bcu'i ming can sa bcur mos pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D1484:133b-26: de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor de skad cig tsam gyis
T02D1484:133b-27: 'byung ba chen po bzhi la gnas pa'i ri rab
T02D1484:133b-28: kyi steng du / gzhal yas khang dur khrod dang bcas pa bskyed de /
T02D1484:133b-29: de'i nang du sna tshogs padma'i ge sar la nyi
T02D1484:133b-30: ma'i steng du rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi
T02D1484:133b-31: 'od las 'phros pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa bltas te
T02D1484:133b-32: / de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das
T02D1484:133b-33: 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa dang bcas pa'i bdag
T02D1484:133b-34: nyid bcom ldan 'das ma dang snyoms par 'jug par
T02D1484:133b-36: de'i 'og tu snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi phreng ba rnams kyis 'khor lo bskul te /
T02D1484:133b-37: nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas pa la mngon du phyogs nas mchod par byas la /
T02D1484:134a-0: sngags dang bcas pas dam tshig gi 'khor lo @134a * //
T02D1484:134a-1: bcug nas ro mnyam par bya ba dang /
T02D1484:134a-2: mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par bya ste /
T02D1484:134a-3: de yang rnam par byang ba'i lag pa g-yen pas
T02D1484:134a-4: yi ge gsum gyi sngags dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D1484:134a-5: / dang po bcom ldan 'das nyid me rtog la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1484:134a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dang /
T02D1484:134a-8: bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po dang /
T02D1484:134a-9: nye ba'i snying po nyid kyis bya'o //
T02D1484:134a-10: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma nas gshin rje 'joms
T02D1484:134a-11: ma la sogs pa'i mthar thug dpa' bo'i dbang phyug
T02D1484:134a-12: ma bcu gnyis man ngag bzhin du rang rang gi
T02D1484:134a-13: sngags kyis phyogs rnams su g-yon skor du dgod cing
T02D1484:134a-14: / mtshams rnams su ni g-yas su bskor bas gnas
T02D1484:134a-15: ji lta ba bzhin de dag la mchod par bya'o
T02D1484:134a-16: / // de nas yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug dang /
T02D1484:134a-18: te te dga' ba'i glus nye bar mchod par bya'o //
T02D1484:134a-19: de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du padma
T02D1484:134a-20: lnga pa lte ba dar bcas pa'i gzhir dpa' mo
T02D1484:134a-21: drug rnams la go rims bzhin du dmar mo dang
T02D1484:134a-26: du ba'i mdog can rnams dgod la /
T02D1484:134a-27: 'khor los sgyur ba drug kyang dkar po dang /
T02D1484:134a-32: ljang gu rnams sngags kyis gzugs su phyogs ji lta
T02D1484:134a-33: ba bzhin du rang rang gi sngags kyis me tog
T02D1484:134a-34: dgod pa sngon du 'gro bas cho ga bzhin du
T02D1484:134a-36: 'khor lo de yang lag pa'i rgyab tu me long
T02D1484:134a-37: dang ba'i ngos gnyis pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhin du gsal
T02D1484:134a-39: de nas de'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags rnams ni /
T02D1484:134a-40: sa la sogs pa'i khams rnams kyi rang bzhin lhung byed ma dang /
T02D1484:134a-41: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi
T02D1484:134a-42: ngo bo nyid du lhag par mos par bya ste
T02D1484:134a-43: / khu ba byin gyis brlabs pas bsang gtor byas
T02D1484:134a-44: la 'khor lo de nyid dpa' bo dang dpa' mo
T02D1484:134a-45: rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'khor
T02D1484:134a-46: lo gsum gyi rang bzhin du mos par byas shing
T02D1484:134a-47: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis me tog la sogs
T02D1484:134a-49: de nas me tog phreng ba'i sngags brjod pa'i mthar dkyil 'khor du dor te /
T02D1484:134b-0: snyim pas blangs @134b nas phreng sngags sngon du brjod pas mgo bor dgod par bya'o //
T02D1484:134b-1: ye shes kyi 'khor lo de yang bdag nyid la
T02D1484:134b-2: bcug bar bsams nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par
T02D1484:134b-3: bya'o // de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs
T02D1484:134b-4: pa cho ga bcu gsum gyis rnam par dag par
T02D1484:134b-5: bya'o // yang bya'o // de'i 'og tu bdag po
T02D1484:134b-6: rnams la bdud rtsi myang ba lta bu'i cho gas
T02D1484:134b-7: gtor ma sbyin pa'ang shes par bya'o //
T02D1484:134b-8: gal te 'byor na rnal 'byor pa rnams 'dus te tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1484:134b-9: de nas rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas mdud pa byas te /
T02D1484:134b-10: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1484:134b-11: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
T02D1484:134b-12: ru ni tshogs pa dang bral ba //
T02D1484:134b-13: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas nyid //
T02D1484:134b-14: he ru ka dpal dkyil 'khor gtso //
T02D1484:134b-16: dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1484:134b-18: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid //
T02D1484:134b-19: 'gro ba skyob pa la phyag 'tshal bstod//
T02D1484:134b-20: ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1484:134b-21: kun du rtog pa 'ching gcod cing //
T02D1484:134b-23: de snyed rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1484:134b-24: ces bya bas bstod par bya'o //
T02D1484:134b-25: cho ga'i bya ba ma tshang ba //
T02D1484:134b-26: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha rnams dang //
T02D1484:134b-27: de sras rnams dang tshangs la sogs //
T02D1484:134b-28: 'jig rten skyong rnams bzod par gsol //
T02D1484:134b-29: zhes bya bas bzod par gsol lo //
T02D1484:134b-31: lha mo tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang //
T02D1484:134b-32: des gsungs tshig ni mchog tu tshad ma ste //
T02D1484:134b-33: bden pa 'di dag gis ni lha mo rnams //
T02D1484:134b-34: bdag la rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig / ces smon lam gdab bar bya ste//
T02D1484:134b-35: 'di ni phyi rol gyi mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1484:134b-36: de nas nang gi rnal 'byor la brtson par 'dod pa'i sngags pas /
T02D1484:134b-37: yang snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'ong zer phreng ba'i
T02D1484:134b-38: lcags kyus 'chang bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyis
T02D1484:134b-39: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa bskul te
T02D1484:134b-41: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D1484:134b-42: de'i spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa
T02D1484:134b-43: bya ba ni // thog med nas bsags sdig dar bag chags mthus //
T02D1484:134b-44: rnam smin sdug bsngal bskyed cing brtas gyur pa'i //
T02D1484:134b-45: sdig dang nyon mongs ji snyed mchis gyur pa //
T02D1484:135a-1: ldan 'khor lo'i gtso la so sor bshags //
T02D1484:135a-2: 'das dang ma byon de bzhin da lta'i dus //
T02D1484:135a-3: nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1484:135a-4: 'bras bu gsang sngags sgrub pa lhur byed pa'i //
T02D1484:135a-5: dge ba mdzad pa kun la rjes yi rang //
T02D1484:135a-6: khyed 'dir mi 'gyur mkha' ltar rtag bzhugs la //
T02D1484:135a-7: dogs pa'i sa las sems can bsgral pa'i phyir //
T02D1484:135a-8: srid pa ji srid gzugs sku rnam gnyis su //
T02D1484:135a-9: mya ngan mi 'da' brtse bas bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1484:135a-10: 'khor ba ji srid bar du bzhugs nas kyang //
T02D1484:135a-11: sems can dman dang mchog dang bar ma la //
T02D1484:135a-12: gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i //
T02D1484:135a-13: bde ba mchog gi 'khor lo bshad du gsol //
T02D1484:135a-14: lha mo rkyang gnyis gtso bo thams cad mkhyen //
T02D1484:135a-15: dus gsum gshegs pa sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid //
T02D1484:135a-16: dus gsum dbyer med ye shes dpa' bo'i thugs //
T02D1484:135a-17: sangs rgyas gtso la gus pas skyabs su mchi ;
T02D1484:135a-18: / ngan 'gro srid pa'i nyon mongs dri sel ba //
T02D1484:135a-19: rnam dag dus gsum dam cho sa ngo bo nyid //
T02D1484:135a-20: a'a li k'i li ro gcig dpa' mo gsungs //
T02D1484:135a-21: skyob ba'i chos la dang bas skyabs su mchi //
T02D1484:135a-22: sdig grogs log par khrid la thar mdzad pa //
T02D1484:135a-23: dus gsum tshogs kyi dam pa'i rang bzhin dpal ;
T02D1484:135a-24: / tshogs gnyis rnal 'byor bde chen lha yi lha yi sku //
T02D1484:135a-25: dge 'dun che la yang dag skyabs su mchi / srid pa'i brtson rar bsdams pa'i nyam thag rnams //
T02D1484:135a-26: bde ba mchog gi sa la dgod pa'i phyir //
T02D1484:135a-27: bgrod pa kun kyang 'khor lo sdom pa yi //
T02D1484:135a-28: lam chen 'di la dga' bas bdag gnas so //
T02D1484:135a-29: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D1484:135a-30: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis te //
T02D1484:135a-31: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir //
T02D1484:135a-32: rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang //
T02D1484:135a-33: padma dang ni las kyi rigs //
T02D1484:135a-34: ji bzhin snyed dam tshig sdom //
T02D1484:135a-35: bdag gis brtan por yang dag bzung //
T02D1484:135a-36: nam yang brtson pa mi dong ro //
T02D1484:135a-37: de lta bas na myur du bdag / ma smin pa rnams smin pa dang //
T02D1484:135a-38: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi //
T02D1484:135a-39: ma rgal ba rnams brgal ba dang //
T02D1484:135a-40: dbugs ma byur rnams dbugs dbyur zhing //
T02D1484:135a-41: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D1484:135a-42: gnas dang nye zhing la sogs bcu gnyis su //
T02D1484:135b-0: dam tshig @135b brda dang bde spyod rol ba'i lam //
T02D1484:135b-1: de ring nas bzung rtag tu longs spyod cing //
T02D1484:135b-2: bde chen ye shes rol bas legs gnas shog /
T02D1484:135b-3: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug rnam mi rtog /
T02D1484:135b-4: lus ngag yid 'dir gsang sngags dge spyad pa //
T02D1484:135b-5: 'gro ba sdug bsngal me tshogs gzhil slad du //
T02D1484:135b-6: ma lus bdag gis dngos grub mchog tu bsngo //
T02D1484:135b-7: zhes bya ba 'di dag gis so //
T02D1484:135b-8: de'i rjes la byams pa dang /
T02D1484:135b-11: btang snyoms tshad med pa tshang ba'i gnas bzhi po
T02D1484:135b-12: dag bsgoms nas bdag nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan
T02D1484:135b-13: las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D1484:135b-14: la skad cig gis gnas par bya'o //
T02D1484:135b-15: aom sva bha' wa shddha:sarba dharm'a:sv'a bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D1484:135b-16: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra bha' wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1484:135b-17: de nas ting nge 'dzin de la langs nas 'gro ba sgyur ma lta bur bltas la /
T02D1484:135b-18: sa bon gyi ye ge yam ram bam lam sum yongs su gyur pa la /
T02D1484:135b-19: gzhu dang gru gsum zlum po dang //
T02D1484:135b-20: gru bzhi dang ni lhun po ste //
T02D1484:135b-21: sngo dang dmar dang dkar dang ser //
T02D1484:135b-23: de steng rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin //
T02D1484:135b-24: ri bo la gnas 'khor lo sbrul /
T02D1484:135b-25: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um lam h'um /
T02D1484:135b-26: aom badzra pr'a kar h'um bam h'um /
T02D1484:135b-27: aom badzra panydza ra h'um bam h'um /
T02D1484:135b-28: aom badzra bi t'a na h'um kham h'um /
T02D1484:135b-29: aom badzra sa ra dz'a la tram sam tram /
T02D1484:135b-30: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um h'um
T02D1484:135b-31: h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis rdo rje'i
T02D1484:135b-32: sa la sogs pa drug sbrul par bya'o //
T02D1484:135b-33: de'i nang du ni sna tshogs padma ge sar gyi
T02D1484:135b-34: steng du a'a li yongs su gyur pa las byung
T02D1484:135b-35: ba'i zla ba dang nyi ma kha sbyor gyi dbus
T02D1484:135b-36: su h'um rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid 'od zer
T02D1484:135b-37: 'phro ba dang 'du ba'i bdag nyid can bsgoms la
T02D1484:135b-38: / de dag yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan
T02D1484:135b-39: 'das he ru ka gzhal yas khang dang bcas par
T02D1484:135b-40: bdag nyid yang dag par bsam mo //
T02D1484:135b-41: de la bcom ldan 'das ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1484:135b-42: gyi sten du 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi dpral
T02D1484:135b-43: ba dang nu mar g-yon bskum zhing g-yas bas bzhugs
T02D1484:135b-44: pa / nam mkha'i mdog can sngon po dang ljang gu dang /
T02D1484:135b-45: dmar po dang ser po'i zhal bzhi mnga' ba re
T02D1484:135b-46: re yang spyan gsum cur thad khro ba'i ngang tshul
T02D1484:135b-47: can / thod pa lngas brgyan pa /
T02D1484:136a-0: sku la mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba brgya'i @136a * //
T02D1484:136a-2: sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa /
T02D1484:136a-4: sku la phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa /
T02D1484:136a-5: zhal mche ba gtsigs pas 'jigs par byed pa stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D1484:136a-6: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D1484:136a-7: rdo rje yan lag mas nye bar 'khyud pa dang /
T02D1484:136a-8: phyag bcu gnyis kyis spras pa ste /
T02D1484:136a-9: rtsa ba'i gnyis kyis rdo rje dang //
T02D1484:136a-11: gnyis kyis glang chen bags pa 'dzin //
T02D1484:136a-12: g-yas phyag gsum pa bzhi pa dang //
T02D1484:136a-13: lnga pa drug pa go rims bzhin //
T02D1484:136a-14: cang te'u dgra sta gri gug dang //
T02D1484:136a-15: rtse gsum rdo rje'i mdung bsnams pa'o //
T02D1484:136a-16: de bzhin g-yon phyag gsum pa yi //
T02D1484:136a-17: bzhi pa lnga pa drug rim ltar //
T02D1484:136a-18: kha tv'am thod pa rdo rje zhags //
T02D1484:136a-19: tshangs pa'i mgo bo mdzes 'dzin pa //
T02D1484:136a-20: rten cing 'brel 'byung rnam dag bdag / de'i mdun
T02D1484:136a-21: du bcom ldan 'das ma bsgrom [?] par bya ba
T02D1484:136a-22: ni sku mdog dmar mo spyan gsum pa /
T02D1484:136a-23: zhal gcig pa dum bu'i ske rags kyis brgyan zhing /
T02D1484:136a-24: kha tv'am gas brgyan pa'i thod pa 'dzin pa'i phyag g-yon pas mgul pa nas 'khyud pa dang /
T02D1484:136a-25: rdo rje tshangs pa'i gri gug rab tu 'bar ba thogs pas steng du sdigs mdzub cher bsgreng ba /
T02D1484:136a-26: byin pa gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi brla gnyis
T02D1484:136a-27: la dkris shing gshibs nas phan tshun bcug pas 'khyud
T02D1484:136a-28: de bzhugs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu gsal bar bsgom
T02D1484:136a-29: par bya'o // de nas shar gyi 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma mdog nag mo dang /
T02D1484:136a-30: g-yon gyi 'dab ma la l'a ma ljang gu dang /
T02D1484:136a-31: nub kyi 'dab ma la dum skyes ma dmar mo dang /
T02D1484:136a-32: g-yas kyi 'dab ma la gzugs can ma ser mo dang /
T02D1484:136a-33: de bzhin du mtshams rnams su ni byang chub kyi
T02D1484:136a-34: sems kyi snod bzang po dag nye ba'i 'dab ma
T02D1484:136a-35: shar la sogs pa bzhir ni /
T02D1484:136a-36: khva gdong ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po dag dang 'dra'o //
T02D1484:136a-37: mtshams bzhir ni gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa
T02D1484:136a-38: bzhi ni phyed kyi mdog can du shes par bya'o
T02D1484:136a-39: // rnal 'byor ma de dag thams cad kyang zhal
T02D1484:136a-40: gcig phyag bzhi ma g-yas bskum nas g-yon brkyang ba'i
T02D1484:136b-0: zhabs kyis ro'i gdan la @136b bzhugs pa /
T02D1484:136b-1: gos dang bral ba phyag rgya lnga'i rgyan cha can
T02D1484:136b-2: thod pa rdo rje phreng bas spras pa'i dbu rab
T02D1484:136b-4: mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan cing thod pa dang /
T02D1484:136b-5: kha tv'am ga dang gri gug dang cang te'u bsnams
T02D1484:136b-6: pa cung zad drag po'i mtshan nyid can du bsam
T02D1484:136b-7: par bya'o // de'i 'og tu de dag thams cad
T02D1484:136b-8: kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams la
T02D1484:136b-9: 'khor lo dang padma dang rdo rje lte ba la
T02D1484:136b-10: gnas pa'i sa bon aom a'a:h'um zhes pa 'di dgod
T02D1484:136b-11: par bya'o // de / ji bzhin spro ba dang
T02D1484:136b-12: bsdu ba'i 'od kyis sbyor ba yongs su sbyang bar
T02D1484:136b-13: par bya'o // de / bya'o // de nas rdo
T02D1484:136b-14: rje go cha'i sngags kyis bcom ldan 'das la go
T02D1484:136b-22: zhes bya ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba drug gi ngo bo 'di dag gis snying ga dang /
T02D1484:136b-27: yan lag thams cad la bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1484:136b-34: ces bya bas dpa' mo drug gi ngo bo 'di dag ni /
T02D1484:136b-35: bcom ldan 'das ma la go cha bgo bar bya'o //
T02D1484:136b-40: spyi bo dang yan lag thams cad la'o //
T02D1484:136b-41: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od ri mo'i lcags kyus ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug ste /
T02D1484:136b-42: dam tshig pa la sngags sngon du 'gro bas gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1484:136b-43: bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1484:136b-44: de las spros pa'i bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i rin
T02D1484:136b-45: po che'i bum pa 'dzin pa'i yum bzhi po dag
T02D1484:136b-46: gis / ji ltar bltams pa tsam nyid la //
T02D1484:136b-47: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba //
T02D1484:136b-48: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D1484:136b-49: de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol //
T02D1484:136b-50: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02D1484:136b-51: zhes sngags brjod pas dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02D1484:136b-52: chu de las byung ba'i rang gi rigs kyi lhas
T02D1484:136b-53: cod pan ji ltar rigs pa nye bar brgyan par
T02D1484:136b-54: bya'o // de'i rjes la snying ga'i sa bon gyi
T02D1484:136b-55: 'od zer gyis gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang
T02D1484:136b-56: bya'o // / bcom ldan 'das ma'i thugs ka'am /
T02D1484:136b-57: padma'i ge sar la bsdus nas de las spros pa'i
T02D1484:136b-58: 'od zer lha mo rnams kyis dam tshig la sogs
T02D1484:136b-59: pa'i rdzas dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bdag po la
T02D1484:137a-2: de nas ma lus pa lha mo dang bcas pas bstod pa'i dbyangs brjod pa ni /
T02D1484:137a-3: khyod ni ye shes rang bzhin bde ba che //
T02D1484:137a-4: khyod ni phan mdzad shin tu rol pa'i sku //
T02D1484:137a-5: khyod ni sa rnams ma lus nyer 'tsho ste //
T02D1484:137a-6: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs bdag bde legs shog ;
T02D1484:137a-7: / bde chen der ni brtan g-yo'i 'jig rten ston //
T02D1484:137a-8: thugs rje sprul pas sems can sad mdzad cing //
T02D1484:137a-9: sgyu ma'i rnam thar sprul pa don kun sgrub //
T02D1484:137a-10: mgon po bde chen dpal ldan dgyes pas bzhengs //
T02D1484:137a-12: de'i rjes la mdun du rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D1484:137a-13: mgo bo gsum la gnas pa'i aa las byung ba'i thod pa'i steng du /
T02D1484:137a-14: sa bon ji lta ba bzhin las skyes pa'i bdud rtsi lnga ste /
T02D1484:137a-16: aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis kha bcad do //
T02D1484:137a-17: 'og tu ni h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje las /
T02D1484:137a-18: thams cad 'bar ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis bdud rtsir bsgyur te /
T02D1484:137a-19: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drang ba dang /
T02D1484:137a-20: ro myang ba'i ngo bo nyid du yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1484:137a-21: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i lces mtshan pas myang
T02D1484:137a-22: bar bya zhing 'phro ba'i sbyor pas lha mo'i tshogs
T02D1484:137a-24: de nas rdo rje padma rnam par sbyangs pa'i brdebs
T02D1484:137a-25: pa las dga' ba'i sgras dga' ba chen pos de
T02D1484:137a-26: bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nang du zhal nas bcug ste
T02D1484:137a-27: / zhu bar gyur pa nor bu'i ze'u 'bru'i dbus
T02D1484:137a-28: kyi thig le gnyis kyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems
T02D1484:137a-29: dpa'i ngo bo nyid du gnas par byas la /
T02D1484:137a-30: lhan cig skyes pa'i don la mngon du phyogs pas ting nge 'dzin du bya'o //
T02D1484:137a-31: kha sbyor dbus na sa bon gnas //
T02D1484:137a-32: thig le gnyis po mi 'gyur bar //
T02D1484:137a-33: rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D1484:137a-34: rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom //
T02D1484:137a-35: zhes ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no //
T02D1484:137a-36: a'a li k'a li mdun bsams nas //
T02D1484:137a-37: rnal 'byor chen po dal bso ste //
T02D1484:137a-38: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs la //
T02D1484:137a-39: lte dbus gnas su rnam par bsgom //
T02D1484:137a-40: yi ge go 'phang mchog gyur pa //
T02D1484:137a-41: de yi dbus su bsam par bya //
T02D1484:137a-42: de ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i //
T02D1484:137a-43: lha yi ngo bo nyid bsgom bya //
T02D1484:137a-45: sems nyid kyang ni ma yin no //
T02D1484:137a-46: bsam med bsam par bya ba'ang med //
T02D1484:137a-47: bsam pa de yang mi shes so //
T02D1484:137b-0: sems dpa' yang ni @137b bsam mi khyab //
T02D1484:137b-1: de nas gzungs ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D1484:137b-3: de'i rjes la snying ga'i sa bon gyi thig le
T02D1484:137b-4: nyi ma'i gzugs kyi steng du sngags kyi phreng ba
T02D1484:137b-5: shin tu phra mo mngon par bltas la /
T02D1484:137b-6: brtan pa'i sems kyis 'phro ba dang /
T02D1484:137b-7: 'du ba'i rim pas man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1484:137b-8: de la aom shr'i he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-9: badzra d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ra sv'a h'a /
T02D1484:137b-10: aom hr'i:ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-11: rje btsun gyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1484:137b-12: aom sarbba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra barna n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1484:137b-13: aom badzra ro tsa n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1484:137b-14: lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1484:137b-15: aom d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-16: aom l'a m'a yee h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-17: aom khanda ro h'a yee h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-18: aom r'u pi n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-19: aom k'a k'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-20: aom au lu k'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-21: aom shva n'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-22: aom s'u ka r'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-23: aom ya ma d'a dh'i h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-24: aom ya me d'u t'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-25: aom ya ma damshti n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1484:137b-26: aom ye ma ma tha n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1484:137b-27: dpa' mo rnams kyi sngags so //
T02D1484:137b-28: aom na mo bha ga ba ti w'i re sh'a ya /
T02D1484:137b-29: ma h'a kalp'a gni sam ni bh'a ya /
T02D1484:137b-30: dz'a ta ma ku to tka t'a ya /
T02D1484:137b-31: damshtra ka r'a lo gra bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya /
T02D1484:137b-32: sa ha sra bhu dza bh'a su r'a yi /
T02D1484:137b-33: ba ra shu p'a sho dya ta sh'u la kha tv'am ga dha ri ni /
T02D1484:137b-34: by'a ghra dzi n'a mba ra dha r'a ya /
T02D1484:137b-35: ma h'a dhu mbr'a ndha ka ra wa push'a ya /
T02D1484:137b-40: tra sa ya tr'a sa ya /
T02D1484:137b-41: ksho bha ya ksho bha ya /
T02D1484:137b-47: be sa ru dhi ra aantra m'a l'a ba lambi ni /
T02D1484:137b-49: sapta p'a te le ga tu bhu dzam gam sarbam b'a /
T02D1484:137b-64: de nas rnal 'byor pa kha lho phyogs su mngon
T02D1484:137b-65: par phyogs pas ji bzhin sbyangs pa'i gtor ma sbyin
T02D1484:137b-66: pa ni / mtshan mo skra grol gcer bu yis //
T02D1484:137b-67: mthon po'i gnas su mchod brtson pas //
T02D1484:137b-68: bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis //
T02D1484:137b-69: rkang pa mnan cing gnas su blta //
T02D1484:137b-70: gsang bstod phem gyi sgra sgrogs shing //
T02D1484:137b-71: phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02D1484:138a-1: mkha'i ngos la legs bzhugs bya //
T02D1484:138a-2: rdo rje thal mo gyen phye la //
T02D1484:138a-3: dpa' bo rnal 'byor snyan gsan dbab //
T02D1484:138a-4: sngags kyis bskul bar byas na ni //
T02D1484:138a-5: de yi mdo la byon par 'gyur //
T02D1484:138a-6: mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo des par sbyar //
T02D1484:138a-7: mthe bong rdo rje brtan po rab tu sbyar //
T02D1484:138a-8: rgya 'di dpral ba'i dbus su nyer bzhag nas //
T02D1484:138a-9: bskor zhing bskor bas phan tshun kun du bskor //
T02D1484:138a-10: g-yas brkyang ba yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1484:138a-11: 'bar ba'i phyag ni bcing bar bya //
T02D1484:138a-12: dam tshig gis ni kha bskang la //
T02D1484:138a-13: sngags ni 'di ltar rjes dran bya //
T02D1484:138a-16: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho:/
T02D1484:138a-17: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D1484:138a-18: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D1484:138a-19: sarba yaksha raksha sarba bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a
T02D1484:138a-20: tsa aunm'a da aa pa sma ra d'a ki n+ya
T02D1484:138a-21: da ya ai mam ba lim grihna ntu sa ma
T02D1484:138a-22: ya raksha ntu sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha ntu /
T02D1484:138a-23: ya thee bam ya theshtam bhunydza tha /
T02D1484:138a-26: ma ma sarba k'a rta ya /
T02D1484:138a-27: satshu kham bi briddha ye sa h'a yi kam bha ba ntu h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1484:138a-28: nye bar sbyin pa'i sngags so //
T02D1484:138a-30: cho ga khyad par 'dod pa dang //
T02D1484:138a-31: 'di skad bshad pa thams cad du kun //
T02D1484:138a-33: dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro nyid //
T02D1484:138a-34: gtsor byas dkyil 'khor thams cad bya //
T02D1484:138a-35: zla ba phyed do'i tshes bcu ni //
T02D1484:138a-36: gnyis kar lha mo mchod par bya //
T02D1484:138a-37: gzhon nu ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1484:138a-38: rtag tu cho ga bzhin tshim bya //
T02D1484:138a-39: de nas sngags pa ldang bar 'dod na mchod pa dang bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1484:138a-40: dkyil 'khor gyi man ngag ji lta ba shes pas
T02D1484:138a-41: yi ge brgya pa'i sngags bzlas pas bsdu bar bya'o
T02D1484:138a-42: // de nas bzod par gsol nas gshegs su gsol ba ni /
T02D1484:138a-43: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha rnams dang //
T02D1484:138a-44: de sras rnams dang tshangs la sogs //
T02D1484:138a-46: mtshang pa rnams bzod par gsol //
T02D1484:138a-47: zhi dang bkra shis bde legs mdzod //
T02D1484:138a-48: gtso bo nus pa ma mchis shing //
T02D1484:138a-49: ma tshang ba dang lhag gyur pa //
T02D1484:138a-50: rnal 'byor gtso bo rjes gnang ste //
T02D1484:138a-51: nongs gyur gang de bzod par gsol //
T02D1484:138a-52: gsang sngags nyams dang bya ba nyams //
T02D1484:138b-0: cho ga nyams @138b par gyur pa gang //
T02D1484:138b-1: mnga' bdag ma yis bkas gnang ste //
T02D1484:138b-2: 'di ni lha mo bzod par gsol //
T02D1484:138b-3: lha mo tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang //
T02D1484:138b-4: des gsungs mchog tu tshang ma gang yin pa //
T02D1484:138b-5: bden pa de dag gis ni lha rnams 'dir //
T02D1484:138b-6: bdag la rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig / ces bya bas bzod par gsol lo ;
T02D1484:138b-7: / khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1484:138b-8: sgrub la rjes mthun dngos grub stsol //
T02D1484:138b-9: sangs rgyas spyod yul gshegs gsol te //
T02D1484:138b-10: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1484:138b-11: tshul khrims tsan dan yan lag byugs //
T02D1484:138b-12: bsam gtan stod g-yogs kyis dkris shing //
T02D1484:138b-13: byang chub yan lag me tog bkram //
T02D1484:138b-14: ji ltar bde ba spyad par bya //
T02D1484:138b-15: aom badzra mandala mu:zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1484:138b-16: gang zhig rtag tu gus pas ni //
T02D1484:138b-17: rnal 'byor brtson la man ngag sbyin //
T02D1484:138b-18: goms pa bskyed pa de la ni //
T02D1484:138b-20: mchod sbyin dbang bskur sbyin sreg dang //
T02D1484:138b-21: tshogs kyi 'khor lo rab gnas sogs //
T02D1484:138b-22: zhi la sogs pa'i las dngos grub //
T02D1484:138b-24: dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom 'byung man ngag gi / ji bzhin grub pa'i yan lag mdor bsdus pa ;
T02D1484:138b-25: / mchog gyur sngags 'chang blo gros sgron rnams la //
T02D1484:138b-26: gsal byed rin chen sgron ma 'bar 'di yin //
T02D1484:138b-27: dge ba gang zhig bdag gis bsags thob pa //
T02D1484:138b-28: de med ston zla lta bur dkar gsal dang //
T02D1484:138b-29: des ni 'jig rten sprin tshogs mun bsal te //
T02D1484:138b-30: snang ba ngo mtshar cig car 'od byed gyur //
T02D1484:138b-31: dpal ldan 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs /
T02D1484:138b-32: rin chen sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa mee tri pas mdzad ba rdzogs so /
T02D1484:138b-34: // / rgya gar skad gyi [*kyi] mkhan po badzra p'a ni'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02D1484:138b-35: bod kyi lo ts'a ba ba reg thos pa dags bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o //
T02D1484:138b-36: slad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa mkhas pa
T02D1484:138b-37: ba ri lo ts'a bas bcos shing gtan la phab
T02D1484:138b-38: pa las / dus phyis kha che'i pandi ta chen
T02D1484:138b-39: po buddha shr'i dzny'a na'i bka' drin la brten nas
T02D1484:138b-40: gnubs lo ts'a bas sgra don ji lta ba bzhin
